title: PHP
description: Make websites go brrr, with added pain.

fields.name: Overview
fields.value: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language that is geared towards web development. It was originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994.

fields.name: Features
fields.value:
- Platform independent
- Simple and straightforward to use
- Great for interactive web applications
- Very stable
- Very flexible
